Frank R.,
 
This post is a very lucid, intelligent, well thought out and
w=
ell written statement. Especially for old army dogs like us that usually
re=
spond with their gut instead of their brain 
 
 
I will concede that I agre=
e with 99.9% of it. 
your right and have humbled me.
 
Bruce
Bruce Halliday=
 


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: warrior18eii@...: Wed, 23 Ja=
n 2008 05:37:26 -0800Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Babs has Issues!






"Hav=
e none of you never wondered why some files here are amazingly clear while =
others are far closer to what actually happens with any of the devices? Has=
 no one else questioned this, even to yourself?"No, I do not question them =
or their reality. No one is born spiritually equal! We all have different l=
evels of experience, psi abilities and connections. For me to say that ever=
yone should get the same connection as me would be unfair and naive. I woul=
d expect that there are many people who get better and worse. I am grateful=
 that I can get a connection at all. This unfounded jealousy is exactly wha=
t brought down INIT.Do you accept everything you see and hear from everyone=
 at face value?Yes, I do! Who am I to question yours or anyone else's reali=
ty? What you believe is true, is true in your world.Do you never have ideas=
 on how things might be improved? Do you never question? Sure, I have sever=
al experimental pieces of equipment that have given me different degrees of=
 success in the clarity of communication. The equipment is only a small par=
t though. Your attitude and intentions are what will strengthen or weaken y=
our transdimensional bonds. If you are having a bad day or harbor feelings =
of resentment, jealousy or hate your chances of connecting with something h=
igher than the earth plane are slim. Not many beings want to come down to t=
his dark level unless they are already here. Usually, these beings are iden=
tified by their pleas for help or a streak of nastiness. The higher beings =
that are around them are usually gatekeepers and "social workers" as I call=
 them. The social workers are the ones trying to help the earthbound spirit=
s to move up and out of the darkness. Gatekeepers facilitate your communica=
tion channels.Anyways, you get the gist.... Bottom line is, if experimenter=
s want to improve transcommunication then they have to work on themselves a=
nd not their equipment.PS: See there is no reason to use nastiness to respo=
nd to questions. Being confident in what you know allows for a calm respons=
e.Regards,Frank R.
----- Original Message ----From: babiarz3 <babiarz3@yaho=
o.com>To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comSent: Monday, January 21, 2008 6:45:02 PMS=
ubject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Babs has Issues!

I never said Frank was misguided or=
 selfish but, I'm not surprised youconstrued it that way.Research and resea=
rchers in the truest form of the word is and areopen to critique and sugges=
tions. So, no, in the truest meaning Idon't believe so. My comments were ab=
solutely valid and could havebeen used in a productive manner but, instead =
I was deflected andcalled names. For myself, I believe it is of utmost impo=
rtance to have an accurateview of what is really happening. Edited files ma=
y indeed be veryaccurate but there is no way to tell when the raw is not av=
ailable andit causes me great concern that the suggestion was met with such=
hostility. If it doesn't cause each of you concern as well, then Iworry abo=
ut your ability to be objective as well. Have none of younever wondered why=
 some files here are amazingly clear while othersare far closer to what act=
ually happens with any of the devices? Hasno one else questioned this, even=
 to yourself? I get approximately 2-3 emails a week from people wondering t=
hat. You can not become offended and take questions like mine personally. I=
was never attacking. I asked for opinions and thoughts about myquestions. D=
o you accept everything you see and hear from everyone at face value?Do you=
 never have ideas on how things might be improved? Do you neverquestion? I'=
m guessing the answer to all three is a "no". I never said anyone was fakin=
g anything here. If you thought that thanI wonder why you thought that. Per=
sonally, I believe thatcommunication is happening. It is the how and the wh=
y and the ways itcan be possibly improved that concern me. It is in knowing=
 what isbeing recorded accurately, before it is cut and spliced and ampedot=
herwise it is not a true representation of what is happening. Wealmost comp=
letely eliminate the truth in peer review when we onlyprovide them with an =
end result not how we got there. There is nothing negative in what I posted=
, only in the reaction. Ihave seen Bruce come under fire before but it's th=
ese comments andopinions and suggestions of mine that cause him so much neg=
ativity hewants to leave? So, in the end I have a clearer idea. The group i=
s concerned solelywith recording and developing devices to do so. That's fi=
ne. Recordingthe communications is a good thing. But my opinions thoughts, =
etc arenot welcome here or desired. That's fine too. I wish you all the bes=
t in your en devours. Sincerely.Babs--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com, Lisby =

lid and could have<BR>been used in a productive manner but, instead I was d=
eflected and<BR>called names. <BR>For myself, I believe it is of utmost imp=
ortance to have an accurate<BR>view of what is really happening. Edited fil=
es may indeed be very<BR>accurate but there is no way to tell when the raw =
is not available and<BR>it causes me great concern that the suggestion was =
met with such<BR>hostility. If it doesn't cause each of you concern as well=
, then I<BR>worry about your ability to be objective as well. Have none of =
you<BR>never wondered why some files here are amazingly clear while others<=
BR>are far closer to what actually happens with any of the devices? Has<BR>=
no one else questioned this, even to yourself? I get approximately 2<BR>-3 =
emails a week from people wondering that. <BR>You can not become offended a=
nd take questions like mine personally. I<BR>was never attacking. I asked f=
or opinions and thoughts about my<BR>questions. <BR>Do you accept everythin=
g you see and hear from everyone at face value?<BR>Do you never have ideas =
on how things might be improved? Do you never<BR>question? I'm guessing the=
 answer to all three is a "no". <BR>I never said anyone was faking anything=
 here. If you thought that than<BR>I wonder why you thought that. Personall=
y, I believe that<BR>communication is happening. It is the how and the why =
and the ways it<BR>can be possibly improved that concern me. It is in knowi=
ng what is<BR>being recorded accurately, before it is cut and spliced and a=
mped<BR>otherwise it is not a true representation of what is happening. We<=
BR>almost completely eliminate the truth in peer review when we only<BR>pro=
vide them with an end result not how we got there. <BR>There is nothing neg=
ative in what I posted, only in the reaction. I<BR>have seen Bruce come und=
er fire before but it's these comments and<BR>opinions and suggestions of m=
ine that cause him so much negativity he<BR>wants to leave? <BR>So, in the =
end I have a clearer idea. The group is concerned solely<BR>with recording =
and developing devices to do so. That's fine. Recording<BR>the communicatio=
ns is a good thing. But my opinions thoughts, etc are<BR>not welcome here o=
r desired. That's fine too. <BR>I wish you all the best in your en devours.=
